title: The Bachelorette's Jackson Garlick goes shirtless as he washes his motorbike in Sydney
text:
Lucky Angie Kent has her pick of a bevy of buffed up boys on this year's season of The Bachelorette.

But there is one who certainly stands out and that is business owner, Jackson Garlick.

The Sydney-based hunk put on quite the show on Thursday when he stepped outside his home to wash his motorcycle.

Ladies, start your engines! Angie Kent's buffed up Bachelorette suitor Jackson Garlick went shirtless as he washed his motorbike in Sydney on Thursday

Soaping up the handlebars, Jackson's rippling abs and buff biceps were on show.

Using a small bucket and a sponge, the keen rugby player lathered up to ensure every nook and cranny of the vehicle was polished.

After hosing off the soap suds, he left the gleaming bike to dry in the sun before riding it back into his garage.

Jackson is the captain of Glebe's Dirty Reds rugby team and has been playing the sport since childhood.

Full throttle! Once the bike was clean he rode it back into his car garage

Despite his love of the game, Jackson admits that he's 'built like an accountant', which led him to ditch a full-time career in rugby to work as a sales executive in the family business, Garlo's Pies.

The cheeky lad's dad is the famous Sean Garlick, who enjoyed a successful rugby career in the nineties before launching his pie company.

During their first meeting on the show's premiere, Jackson offered Angie one of his family's world famous pies, only to discover she doesn't eat meat and is a coeliac.

No wonder he's buff! Jackson is the captain of Glebe's Dirty Reds rugby team and has been playing the sport since childhood

Lucky Angie! Soaping up the handlebars, Jackson's rippling abs and buff biceps were on show

Sean memorably appeared in the soaps Heartbreak High and Home and Away, and also had a small role in the 1987 TV movie Nightmaster starring Nicole Kidman.

Jackson is a regular on Sydney's social scene, partying at hotspots like Hotel Ravisis in Bondi and Seadeck on the Sydney Harbour.

He also has a number of reality star pals, including Married At First Sight's Ryan Gallagher.

Businessman: Despite his love of the game, Jackson admits that he's 'built like an accountant', which led him to ditch a full-time career in rugby to work as a sales executive in the family business, Garlo's Pies

Acting credentials: Sean memorably appeared in the soaps Heartbreak High and Home and Away, and also had a small role in the 1987 TV movie Nightmaster starring Nicole Kidman
description: Lucky Angie Kent has her pick of a bevy of buffed up men on this year's season of The Bachelorette.
